Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-23931 affecting package python-cryptography for versions less than 3.3.2-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-23931 affecting package python-cryptography for versions less than 3.3.2-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-cryptography is earlier than 3.3.2-5, affected by CVE-2023-23931
